text: I work for a company called show my homework and we're current looking for a few ember.js developers. We're just about to launch our new app which is a rails 4 api and ember.js frontend. Ideally looking for permanent candidates. PM me if you're interested.
Hi <@U04AW7GPM>. Sorry for the slow reply. If you’d like me to add a slide to this month’s intro deck, please email full details to <mailto:info@emberlondon.com|info@emberlondon.com>
